posts.postText:
Offender name?: Party rocker rainbow

  Proof?:cant really post proof, fudge was recording and got the sound. so i guess you can take it from that. i have several screen shots of him lying about saying it was an accident. it was pretty obvious that he did it on purpose. he then says sorry about 4 times.

Heres Screens:

Locked.
